case.title: borrowed - 34 (NYC/NJ)
case.text: I am borrowing from a male poster. I like the way his ad sounded. Do you? Edited: ME: I am a BBW with: pretty face, big chest, full hips, thick thighs. Loves the way a hard, muscular body or a big strong man feels against my soft, curvy body. Looking for a strong, intelligent man. E-mail me.
